company.name: Weymedia Inc (CreditCardGenius)
company.description: Canadian fintech company providing gamified approach to financial product discovery and rewards optimization

primary: Single-handedly architect and develop company's first mobile application
Own entire mobile solution from conception to production deployment
Integrate third-party financial APIs (Plaid, Flinks) for secure data handling
secondary: Collaborate with backend team for API design and optimization
Work with product team to translate business requirements into technical solutions
Coordinate with limited UI/UX design resources for optimal user experience
leadership: Drive mobile strategy and technical decisions independently
Coordinate cross-functional team members to gather resources and context
Plan and execute mobile development roadmap with minimal supervision
technical: Build custom Expo native modules for high-performance API processing
Implement comprehensive CI/CD pipeline with self-hosted Bitbucket runners
Establish automated testing workflows using Cypress for React Native
Navigate SOC2 security audit requirements and compliance
business: Deliver company's entry into mobile market within tight timeline constraints
Create gamified user experience to increase engagement with financial products
Build scalable mobile foundation for future feature development

projects.name: GeniusCash Mobile App
projects.description: Company's first mobile application for gamified financial rewards and product discovery
projects.impact: Launched first mobile product, achieved 1000+ monthly active users, 3.5-4.3 app store rating
challenges: Limited UI/UX design resources requiring creative problem-solving
Complex financial integrations with strict security requirements
Heavy API processing that could block UI thread performance
SOC2 compliance requirements for financial data handling
solutions: Built custom native Expo modules for efficient API processing without blocking UI
Implemented robust error handling and monitoring with Sentry and Bugfender
Created intuitive UX patterns despite limited design resources
Architected secure data flows meeting SOC2 audit requirements

projects.name: Self-Hosted CI/CD Pipeline
projects.description: Custom Bitbucket pipeline infrastructure for mobile app deployment
projects.impact: Zero-cost deployment solution, faster builds than cloud alternatives, automated testing and deployment
challenges: Expensive cloud CI/CD solutions beyond company budget
Need for automated TestFlight and Google Play deployments
solutions: Built comprehensive self-hosted pipeline with code health checks
Automated store deployments reducing manual intervention to zero
Implemented OTA update system for rapid feature rollouts

achievements.description: Single-handedly delivered company's first mobile application in 9 months
achievements.impact: Opened new mobile market channel for customer acquisition
achievements.metrics: 100% mobile solution ownership, 0 to production deployment

achievements.description: Achieved 1000+ monthly active users with 3.5-4.3 app store rating
achievements.impact: Strong user adoption and satisfaction for new mobile product
achievements.metrics: 1000+ MAU, 3.5-4.3 star rating across app stores

achievements.description: Built zero-cost CI/CD infrastructure replacing expensive cloud solutions
achievements.impact: Significant cost savings while improving deployment efficiency
achievements.metrics: 100% cost reduction vs cloud alternatives, automated deployments

achievements.description: Successfully passed SOC2 security audit for financial compliance
achievements.impact: Enabled secure handling of financial data and regulatory compliance

achievements.description: Created custom native modules for high-performance API processing
achievements.impact: Solved critical performance bottlenecks in financial data processing
achievements.metrics: Eliminated UI thread blocking, smooth user experience

context.businessContext: Canadian fintech startup focused on gamified financial product discovery and rewards optimization
challenges: Limited resources requiring solo mobile development
Strict financial security and compliance requirements
Tight timeline for market entry with first mobile product
Heavy API processing requirements affecting performance
constraints: Small team with limited UI/UX design support
Need for rapid feature development and deployment
